participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Friendly and hardworking, with a love for nature and a strong sense of tradition.
participant_1.background: i've a pet cow. i only listen to country music. i drive a big truck and live in country. i work my parents farms.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and sociable, with a passion for games and a love for the ocean.
participant_2.background: i love to play board games. my parents were also teachers. my favorite band is up and i got to see them in concert once. for vacation i enjoy time at the beach.
